actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to prohibit private insurance agents and brokers from selling Federal crop insurance unless they are licensed under applicable State law.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to prohibit private insurance agents and brokers from selling Federal crop insurance unless they are licensed under applicable State law or are otherwise permitted by the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to prohibit private insurance agents and brokers from selling Federal crop insurance unless they are licensed under applicable State law.
